===Prerequisites===

You need OS X 10.5 or newer, and Xcode 3.1.1 or newer.

=== build scripts ===

Checkout code from https://objcmapper.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ and you'll see to scripts
 * build_debug.sh - builds library with debug information and tracing 
 * build_release - build with comiler optimizations and withot tracing

use them to build library
